column5: I got 3 days to spend next week fishing and boating with the kids. Which one provides the better camping fishing combo? I have never been to either. Or maybe someone could suggest another spot in the area. thanks
Check-out the exact same thread on Page 2 of the board by Kennyman  Quite a few replies to that one and some good advice.  Good luck 007
That's funny .... I thought this was my post so I clicked on it looking for more replies LOL  . I booked at Emily by the way.
